definitions.definition: A philosophy which holds that the universe is chaotic and irrational and that any attempt to impose order will ultimately fail.
definitions.dating_raw: First attested in the mid 20 century.

main_definition: ( uncountable , philosophy ) A philosophy which holds that the universe is chaotic and irrational and that any attempt to impose order will ultimately fail. [First attested in the mid 20 century.]
secondary_definitions: ( countable ) Absurdity , something that is absurd
